lines.text: Mrs. Columbo! She loves to dance! That's how I get my exercise, she wears me out!
You're not losing a daughter, you're gaining a police force.
Andy WHERE ARE YOU? Where are all those cops I married into? You're losing it, Melissa.
Oh she got her throat cut. She's up in Heaven waiting for us.

Please, God, help me! Why did he let the door rust? Why didn't he oil it? Rust... that's it! Vinegar dissolves rust, vinegar does this, vinegar does that, thank you Mom for telling me that, and thank you, God!
[pours a bottle of vinegar on the hinges]
Let it soak in, Melissa, don't rush it.
